markdownRemark.html: Everyone who has spent some time working with git irremediably knows about merging. The merge command brings the changes carried out in another branch —B— to the current one —A—. When the starting branch (the one where the new branch starts from) also happens to be modified, the changes are synchronised based on the timeline.
